PluginData.Author: StarCpt
PluginData.Description:
Adds folders for the gps tab. To add gpses to a folder, add <Folder> at the very beginning of the description (no spaces!!), followed by the desired folder name, and lastly append </Folder> at the end of the folder name. Example: <Folder>My Folder</Folder> Folder names must be between 1 and 32 characters long. Other Features: - Copying and pasting whole folders if both people are using the plugin. - Show/Hide folders on hud - Double click on a folder to only browse its gpses
Visit the github page for more information.
